BREAST-COMPOSITION: This mammogram image shows a heterogeneously dense breast composition (ACR C), indicating a significant amount of glandular tissue with some fatty areas.
BIRADS: BI-RADS 3, this is a benign lesion requiring short-term follow-up to confirm stability
FINDINGS: There are no visible calcifications (CALC), well-defined masses (CIRC), spiculated masses (SPIC), or other ill-defined masses (MISC) in this image. However, there is a slight architectural distortion (ARCH) noted in the upper outer quadrant of the right breast. This requires further imaging (MRI, ultrasound) or biopsy for confirmation.
